variables.input:
// filter timeseries by the selected cluster
fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
| fields entity.name
| sort entity.name asc

// filter timeseries by the selected namespace
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace
| fields id, name = entity.name
// show only namespaces in the selected cluster 
| filter in(id, classicEntitySelector(concat("type(CLOUD_APPLICATION_NAMESPACE),toRelationship.isClusterOfNamespace(type(KUBERNETES_CLUSTER),entityName.equals(", $Cluster, "))")))
| fields name
| sort name asc

// used to navigate to the kubernetes app
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace
| filter entity.name==$Namespace
| filter in(id, classicEntitySelector(concat("type(CLOUD_APPLICATION_NAMESPACE),toRelationship.isClusterOfNamespace(type(KUBERNETES_CLUSTER),entityName.equals(", $Cluster,"))")))
| fields id

6.title: Cluster CPU Utilization Contribution

7.title: Cluster Memory Utilization Contribution

8.title: Pods

9.title: CPU Requests Utilization

leftYAxisSettings.label: Kubernetes: Container - CPU usage • Kubernetes: Container - CPU requests

10.title: Memory Requests Utilization

leftYAxisSettings.label: Kubernetes: Container - working set memory • Kubernetes: Container - memory requests

11.title: CPU Limits Utilization

leftYAxisSettings.label: Kubernetes: Container - CPU usage • Kubernetes: Container - CPU limits

12.title: Memory Limits Utilization

leftYAxisSettings.label: Kubernetes: Container - working set memory • Kubernetes: Container - memory limits

13.title: CPU Usage per Pod

15.title: CPU Quota
15.query:
// show summarized CPU metrics for the selected cluster and namespace
timeseries {
  cpu_usage = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_usage),
  cpu_throttled = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_throttled),
  requests_cpu = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.requests_cpu),
  limits_cpu = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.limits_cpu)
}, filter: {
  k8s.cluster.name == $Cluster AND
  k8s.namespace.name == $Namespace
}, by: { dt.entity.cloud_application_instance, k8s.pod.name },
from: -2m,
nonempty: true,
// join incomplete timeseries, e.g. undefind CPU limits
union: true
| fieldsRemove interval, timeframe
| fieldsAdd cpu_usage = arrayFirst(cpu_usage)
| fieldsAdd cpu_throttled = arrayFirst(cpu_throttled)
| fieldsAdd requests_cpu = arrayFirst(requests_cpu)
| fieldsAdd limits_cpu = arrayFirst(limits_cpu)
| fieldsAdd requests_cpu_percent = cpu_usage / requests_cpu * 100
| fieldsAdd limits_cpu_percent = cpu_usage / limits_cpu * 100
| fieldsAdd cpu_slack = (requests_cpu - cpu_usage) / 1000
| sort cpu_usage desc
| fieldsRename `Name` = k8s.pod.name, `CPU Usage` = cpu_usage, `CPU Throttled` = cpu_throttled, `CPU Requests` = requests_cpu, `CPU Requests %` = requests_cpu_percent, `CPU Limits` = limits_cpu, `CPU Limits %` = limits_cpu_percent, `CPU Slack` = cpu_slack

19.title: Memory Usage per Pod

20.title: Memory Quota

22.title: Receive Bandwidth

23.title: Transmit Bandwidth

25.title: Rate of Received Packets Dropped

26.title: Rate of Transmitted Packets Dropped

28.title: Rate of Received Errors

29.title: Rate of Transmitted Errors

34.title: Network Usage
34.query:
// list the latest stable network metrics for all pods
timeseries {
  receiveData = sum(dt.kubernetes.pod.network_received_data),
  transmitData = sum(dt.kubernetes.pod.network_transmitted_data),
  receivePacketDrop = sum(dt.kubernetes.pod.network_received_packets_dropped),
  transmitPacketDrop = sum(dt.kubernetes.pod.network_transmitted_packets_dropped),
  receiveError = sum(dt.kubernetes.pod.network_received_errors),
  transmitError = sum(dt.kubernetes.pod.network_transmitted_errors)
}, filter: {
  k8s.cluster.name == $Cluster AND
  k8s.namespace.name == $Namespace
}, by: { dt.entity.cloud_application_instance, k8s.pod.name },
from: -2m,
nonempty: true,
union: true
| fieldsRemove interval, timeframe
| fieldsAdd receiveData = arrayFirst(receiveData)
| fieldsAdd transmitData = arrayFirst(transmitData)
| fieldsAdd receivePacketDrop = arrayFirst(receivePacketDrop)
| fieldsAdd transmitPacketDrop = arrayFirst(transmitPacketDrop)
| fieldsAdd receiveError = arrayFirst(receiveError)
| fieldsAdd transmitError = arrayFirst(transmitError)
| sort receiveData desc
| fieldsRename `Name` = k8s.pod.name
, `Current Receive Bandwidth` = receiveData
, `Current Transmit Bandwidth` = transmitData
, `Rate of Received Packets Dropped` = receivePacketDrop
, `Rate of Transmitted Packets Dropped` = transmitPacketDrop
, `Rate of Received Errors` = receiveError
, `Rate of Transmitted Errors` = transmitError

categoricalBarChartSettings.valueAxisLabel: Current Receive Bandwidth,Current Transmit Bandwidth,Rate of Received Packets Dropped,Rate of Transmitted Packets Dropped,Rate of Received Errors,Rate of Transmitted Errors

35.content:
### Pods in Namespace: [$Namespace](/ui/intent/dynatrace.kubernetes/view-entity-dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace/#{"id":"$NamespaceID"})
Analyze resource allocation of all pods within a namespace. If you don't see data, [start monitoring your cluster](/ui/apps/dynatrace.kubernetes/onboarding) or [explore this dashboard in our Playground](https://wkf10640.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/document/dynatrace.kubernetes.kubernetes-namespace-pods)
